title: GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_PROP_TEXTURE_VARIATIONS
content:
0x75CAF9CC// GetNumberOfPedCollectionPropTextureVariations
int GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_PROP_TEXTURE_VARIATIONS(Ped ped, int anchorPoint, char* collection, int propIndex);Parameters:ped: The target pedanchorPoint: One of the anchor points from SET_PED_PROP_INDEXcollection: Name of the collection. Empty string for the base game collection. See GET_PED_COLLECTION_NAME in order to list all available collections.propIndex: Local prop index inside the given collection. Refer to GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_PROP_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS.Returns: Number of texture variations available for the given prop. Returns 0 if ped or collection does not exist or index is out of bounds.An alternative to GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_PROP_TEXTURE_VARIATIONS that uses local collection indexing instead of the global one.
codeBlocks:
// GetNumberOfPedCollectionPropTextureVariations
int GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_PROP_TEXTURE_VARIATIONS(Ped ped, int anchorPoint, char* collection, int propIndex);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_PROP_TEXTURE_VARIATIONS
GetNumberOfPedCollectionPropTextureVariations(ped, 0, '', 0)
